title: Functions & Events Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of JavaScript functions and events

questions.question: What does a function do in JavaScript?
choices: Groups reusable code that can be executed later
questions.explanation: Functions let you reuse logic instead of repeating it.

questions.question: What is the correct way to define a function named sayHi?
questions.explanation: Use function to define named functions.

questions.question:
What does this code do?
button.addEventListener("click", changeColor);
choices: Runs changeColor only when the button is clicked
questions.explanation: The listener waits for a "click" event.

questions.question: Which of the following defines an arrow function correctly?
questions.explanation: Arrow functions use => between parameters and body.

questions.question: What does document.getElementById("btn") return?
choices: The HTML element with that ID
questions.explanation: It returns the DOM element so you can attach events or modify it.
